Hey guys.
Here it is. Finally. Half Life 2 on your Mac. No need to install Steam or anything. Just download and play. I have a pretty shitty internet connection so give the torrent a bit of time and I'm sure some seeders will pop up soon.
This is ONLY Half-Life 2 (NOT including the lost coast).. NOT the Orange Box. Everything works fine on my 13 inch White Macbook (30/35 fps usually) and the graphics are superb when played on my friend's desktop iMac.
There shouldn't be any problems besides a bit of messed up text, and an oddly colored target reticule. Basically everything works great. Beyond great. Hell, I even picked a pretty li'l icon so the game looks like a Mac game.
Have fun!
Macs pwn.

(If there are any bugs just post 'em here in the comments and I'll try to fix them. I'm going to try to seed for about 30 hours or so until I get a few copies out there. PLEASE SEED! I checked the entire interwebs and this seems to be the only ported HL2 game out there, so if you see another it was me ;) )

P.S. Next I'm going to try to port Counter Strike or Oblivion (I think Oblivion will work with the Cider template from Spore)... but we'll see... cheers!
